name: Cinapse
headline: The Operating System of Hollywood
description: Cinapse makes it easy for a film or television crew to manage tens of thousands of digital production documents and daily workflows. We do this by providing one simple app that all crew, cast, and office staff can use on Web, iOS, and Android.
tags: industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:entertainment; industry:productivity; industry:enterprise; location:los-angeles

founders.name: Herman Phillips, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CEO @ Cinapse. Previously in the Assistant Directors department on major films and television series including Disney+'s The Mandalorian and The Book of Boba Fett; HBO's Silicon Valley, Euphoria, and Insecure; Steven Spielberg's The Fabelmans; and various other Netflix, HBO, Apple, Disney, and Hulu productions.

founders.name: Roger Tran, Founder
founders.description:
COO @ Cinapse
UX, Architecture, Real Estate Development, Locations Rentals, Stanford, Harvard.
Los Angeles / San Francisco.

# Reimagine Production 
# Scheduling
Schedule films, TV series, and commercials collaboratively.
[ Start 7-day free trial ](https://cinapse.io/<https:/scheduling.cinapse.io/signup>)
Cinapse was created in collaboration with over 1,000 industry-leading UPMs, ADs, and Producers from these studios üëá
![Frame 80.png](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5ffc9d66323fc22a59bb17cc/0f1c7e00-152b-4099-b204-d507ed1087b3/Frame+80.png)
![Frame 88.png](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5ffc9d66323fc22a59bb17cc/74012146-8ac7-4e5a-a1ab-7d2fc5c2456b/Frame+88.png)
![Frame 86.png](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5ffc9d66323fc22a59bb17cc/83823923-f8ab-430b-9917-497e5859210d/Frame+86.png)
![Frame 85.png](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5ffc9d66323fc22a59bb17cc/479df531-10b3-4774-9b6f-513d89d0a082/Frame+85.png)
![Frame 84.png](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5ffc9d66323fc22a59bb17cc/3d7ef83f-6adf-47d9-9d86-9d85e4ba9696/Frame+84.png)
![Frame 83.png](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5ffc9d66323fc22a59bb17cc/fd69b5e8-7816-4030-a606-358276e6b66c/Frame+83.png)
![Frame 82.png](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5ffc9d66323fc22a59bb17cc/87186307-64b9-4a08-b18c-aa5e93340dc8/Frame+82.png)
![Frame 93.png](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5ffc9d66323fc22a59bb17cc/b87f02d5-c5e1-4657-8cda-13df698fbe67/Frame+93.png)
![Frame 92.png](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5ffc9d66323fc22a59bb17cc/d3f3ac8c-cb28-4653-bf23-65f51d87f79c/Frame+92.png)
![Frame 91.png](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5ffc9d66323fc22a59bb17cc/540af9c5-9663-49ad-89ad-3f27f72ca158/Frame+91.png)
![Frame 90.png](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5ffc9d66323fc22a59bb17cc/f3146962-eb67-44a5-8f65-aa618981b347/Frame+90.png)
![Frame 89.png](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5ffc9d66323fc22a59bb17cc/951b827b-c069-416d-a030-d3d24d961f17/Frame+89.png)
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5ffc9d66323fc22a59bb17cc/8fe3927f-4b88-4974-a728-911380fa8245/Viewport+-+1440x900.png)
Testimonials
  * ## "Cinapse provides a fantastic alternative to Movie Magic Scheduling. It solves many of the problems that plague its competitor, including making cross-boarding easy and almost painless, the ability to share files in real time so multiple parties can work on the same document, and most importantly the prompt fixing of bugs and the addressing of issues. I never want to go back!"
**Emily Hogan**[**(IMDb)**](https://cinapse.io/<https:/www.imdb.com/name/nm1435602/?ref_=nv_sr_srsg_0_tt_0_nm_8_q_emily%2520hogan>)DGA 1st Assistant DirectorIt‚Äôs Away‚Äôs Sunny in Philadelphia, FXMythic Quest, AppleTV+
  * ## "It's like you were sent by God."
**Inti Carboni**[**(IMDb)**](https://cinapse.io/<https:/www.imdb.com/name/nm0136217/>)DGA & AIARSE 1st Assistant DirectorMission Impossible, Spectre
  * ## "Cinapse has changed the way I‚Äôm able to work. It‚Äôs obviously designed by people who know production intimately."
**Luke Maxcy**[**(IMDb)**](https://cinapse.io/<https:/www.imdb.com/name/nm3170436/>)DGA 1st Assistant Director. For All Mankind, AppleTV+
[ ](https://cinapse.io/<#>)
  * ## "Cinapse has been a game changer for the multiple user feature and live nature of board. The shooting schedule is smartly designed and easy to read. And the Episodic DOOD saves lot of time and confusion. Script importing from Final Draft or Scriptation is a real time saver - easy to use and virtually glitch free. The Cinapse team is always available to assist new users in navigating. Thanks, we‚Äôve been waiting for this!"
**Joanne Gerein**[**(IMDb)**](https://cinapse.io/<https:/www.imdb.com/name/nm0314232/>)DGC 1st Assistant DirectorSchool Spirits, Paramount+
  * ## "Cinapse is a breath of fresh air. In an industry like ours where time is money, it‚Äôs a great feeling to be able to focus our attention less on ancient software issues and more on the parts of filmmaking that matter most."
**Peter Farnsworth, Jr.**[**(IMDb)**](https://cinapse.io/<https:/www.imdb.com/name/nm3615609/?ref_=ext_shr_lnk>)DGA Key 2nd Assistant Director
  * ## "Functionality is vastly improved since the Beta. Like night and day. It gets better every time I open the app."
**Narbeh Nazarian**[**(IMDb)**](https://cinapse.io/<https:/www.imdb.com/name/nm2624529/>)DGA 1st Assistant DirectorShrinking, AppleTV+


Item 1 of 6
### Designed to make crossboarding easier.
#### Features
Stop emailing files back and forth. Use Cinapse to create multi-unit or multi-episode schedules collaboratively in one workspace. Split up the work, build out your strips in the same file, and when you‚Äôre ready ‚Äî just drag & drop your teammates‚Äô breakdowns into your board.
### Work together, or work alone. It‚Äôs up to you.
#### Features
Control who and when someone can edit the file. Share temporarily to your team; then remove access whenever you want to work in a vacuum.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5ffc9d66323fc22a59bb17cc/41ce7580-e509-4a95-9488-bc110fa29493/Cinapse+-+2+-+Share.png)
### Episodic logic and DooDs come built in.
#### Features
Say goodbye to Jane (101), Jane (108) and Jane (**). In Cinapse, she‚Äôs just ‚ÄúJane.‚Äù Episodic logic is built into every element, breakdown, report, and DooD. 
## Schedule smarter.
Import scripts from Scriptation and Final Draft
Quickstart your project by importing scene headers, page counts, cast and tagged elements.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5ffc9d66323fc22a59bb17cc/ff9dd570-f58f-44dd-8c90-18fb23808ba7/Script+Impoorter.png)
Go offline
Keep working on files even without internet connection. Changes will sync next time you go back online.
Download the desktop app
Available to Chrome users on MacOS and Windows.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5ffc9d66323fc22a59bb17cc/a333f5ba-e0cb-4e86-8cf7-43663e0c9b95/Cinapse+-+6+-+Download+Icon.png)
Navigate intuitively
Designed to be simple, familiar, and easy-to-learn.
Encrypted and secure
Cinapse complies with major studio security requirements. All data is encrypted at rest and in transit using industry standard protocols, and Multi-Factor Authentication is available to all users.
Element linking
Easily define rules if you want ‚Äúhelmet‚Äù and ‚Äújetpack‚Äù to always show up whenever you add ‚Äú1. Roger‚Äù to a breakdown sheet.
Red flags
Create red flags and events in one simple calendar interface. Add notes to each flag for more context.
PDF reports
Generate one-liners, shooting schedules, Day out of Days, element lists, and category-by-day reports.
### Work even faster with our flexible split-screen design.
Usability
Mix-and-match any view you like. Our layouts are designed to make scheduling more efficient. Input data rapidly and effortlessly manage the views you need.
### Create beautiful layouts and color palettes.
Customizations
We know your layout is the best one out there. Use modern design tools to tailor the look and content of your strips, text-banners, and day breaks.
## Over 15% 
## of the DGA and DGC have already signed up.
[ Get started ](https://cinapse.io/<https:/scheduling.cinapse.io/signup>)
#### Coming soon
### We update Cinapse all the time.Here‚Äôs a sneak peek of what‚Äôs coming next.
### Publish schedules to your crew. Get the big picture ‚Äî or dive into the details.
Customizations
Stop wasting time exporting dozens of reports every time a new version of the schedule is released. With publishing, simply send a secure link to your entire crew and they‚Äôll get every view they need. Cinapse‚Äôs published schedules give your team the ability to search, filter and find the information they want ‚Äî instantly.
### Know precisely what changed in the latest schedule.
#### ChangeLog
Make sure your department heads don‚Äôt miss a detail whenever the schedule changes. Cinapse automatically highlights what changed between published versions.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5ffc9d66323fc22a59bb17cc/293da0be-a0ba-4691-94ca-19983f8ea478/13+-+ChangeLog.png)
### Understand the big picture in monthly view ‚Äî edit the details in weekly view.
#### Calendar View
Move strips and days in a calendar interface. Export entire schedules to Google Calendar.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5ffc9d66323fc22a59bb17cc/6c9752d5-ead7-4fab-9d45-98da3f2ce045/13+-+Monthly+View.png)
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5ffc9d66323fc22a59bb17cc/d6a10cd9-1aa3-4b65-a98a-f2b10d09dece/12+-+Weekly.png)
### Recent updates
Featured

Dec 6, 2024
Assign Text Banners to a Unit
Custom Layouts for Calendar View
Drag-and-Drop on iPad/Tablet fix
Dec 6, 2024
[ ](https://cinapse.io/</updates/version-1-19>)
Nov 7, 2024

Nov 7, 2024
Upgraded FDX Importer
Show/hide cell borders
Re-order categories fix
Nov 7, 2024
## Schedule your next production with Cinapse.
[ Try Cinapse ](https://cinapse.io/<https:/scheduling.cinapse.io/signup>)

generated_description:
**Cinapse: The Operating System of Hollywood**

Founded in 2020, Cinapse aims to revolutionize the film and television production process. Their mission? To become the ultimate operating system for Hollywood, simplifying how crews manage the mountain of digital production documents and daily workflows. 

At its core, Cinapse offers a sleek, intuitive app that caters to the needs of everyone involved‚Äîcrew, cast, and office staff‚Äîstreamlining collaboration across platforms (Web, iOS, and Android). This is not just about solving problems; it's about reimagining how productions are organized.

Located in the heart of Los Angeles, CA, and backed by Y Combinator's Batch W22, Cinapse has swiftly grown to a team of just ten passionate employees. With Nan as their group partner, they‚Äôre well-positioned to tap into the intricate web of Hollywood‚Äôs production needs. 

What sets Cinapse apart? It‚Äôs built in partnership with over a thousand industry-leading Unit Production Managers (UPMs), Assistant Directors (ADs), and Producers, allowing their software to reflect real-world requirements. They‚Äôve managed to capture a significant chunk of the Director‚Äôs Guild of America (DGA) and Director's Guild of Canada (DGC)‚Äîover 15% have already jumped on board.

Cinapse emphasizes productivity and clarity, drastically reducing the tedious back-and-forth communication typically required in production scheduling. Features like collaborative scheduling, episodic logic, and seamless file sharing empower teams to focus more on creativity and less on admin work. Need to adapt on the fly? No problem. Changes sync effortlessly, and you can continue working offline if necessary.

Moreover, Cinapse shines in customization‚Äîallowing users to tailor their interfaces and workflows to fit their unique styles. Their flexible design and robust security compliance cater to the nuanced requirements of major studios, ensuring that sensitive data is handled with care.

In a space where time is money, Cinapse is a breath of fresh air‚Äîa modern solution for a time-honored industry. Their holistic approach can drastically improve team communication and organization, ultimately enabling better storytelling.

If you‚Äôre curious to see how Cinapse can enhance your production processes, check them out at [Cinapse.io](https://cinapse.io). With an engaging and easy-to-use platform, it's designed not just for production professionals but by them‚Äîwhether you're scheduling the next blockbuster or a small indie film. As they say, reimagine production, the Hollywood way.
